Wwise Unity Integration » Build for target platform

Build for Windows Phone 8.0

The Wwise Unity integration for Windows Phone 8.0 does not supply a pre-compiled DLL and this alters the build process. To build a game for Windows Phone 8.0, do the following:

  1. In the Build Settings window (File > Build Settings...), under Platforms, select Windows Phone 8 and click Switch Platform.
  2. Click Build, and select a destination folder.
  3. Open the generated Visual Studio solution.
  4. Make sure your Windows Phone device is connected and unlocked.
  5. In Visual Studio, click Debug > Start Debugging. The game deploys to the device after the compilation is complete.
See also:
  • Windows Phone 8.0 Specific information.
